mapper.select: SELECT C.EMP_CODE , C.USAGE_CODE , D.DETAIL_CODE_NAME USAGE_NAME , TO_CHAR(C.REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQUEST_DATE , TO_CHAR(C.USE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USE_DATE , C.APPROVAL_STATUS , C.REJECT_CAUSE , C.ETC FROM CERTIFICATE C , DETAIL_CODE D WHERE C.USAGE_CODE = D.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER AND C.EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND C.REQUEST_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CERTIFICATE WHERE EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND REQUEST_DATE = TO_DATE(#{requestDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.select: SELECT D.DEPT_NAME , C.EMP_CODE , E.EMP_NAME , C.USAGE_CODE , DD.DETAIL_CODE_NAME , TO_CHAR(C.REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQUEST_DATE , TO_CHAR(C.USE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USE_DATE , C.APPROVAL_STATUS , C.REJECT_CAUSE , C.ETC FROM CERTIFICATE C , EMP E , DEPT D , DETAIL_CODE DD WHERE C.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE(+) AND E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE(+) AND C.USAGE_CODE = DD.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER(+) AND REQUEST_DATE = TO_DATE(#{requestDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT D.DEPT_NAME , C.EMP_CODE , E.EMP_NAME , C.USAGE_CODE , DD.DETAIL_CODE_NAME , TO_CHAR(C.REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQUEST_DATE , TO_CHAR(C.USE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USE_DATE , C.APPROVAL_STATUS , C.REJECT_CAUSE , C.ETC FROM CERTIFICATE C , EMP E , DEPT D , DETAIL_CODE DD WHERE C.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE(+) AND E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE(+) AND C.USAGE_CODE = DD.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER(+) AND D.DEPT_NAME = #{deptName} AND REQUEST_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
